regexInstructions: Use parentheses () in 'Filename Regex' to create capture groups.
Use \1, \2, \3, etc., in 'Rename Regex' to reference corresponding groups.
E.g., (\d{2}) captures two digits, referenced with \1.
You can modify the test filename above to validate different cases.
Click the test case buttons above to load examples.
parseInstructions: Use curly braces {} in 'Source Template' to create capture fields, e.g., {name}.
Use the same {name} in 'Destination Template' to reference the corresponding field.
You can specify types, e.g., {episode:d} will only match numbers.
Click the test case buttons above to load examples.
